title: Add Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search sections with search

requirements.text: Provide a “Meeting History” section/page for authenticated users that lists all meetings and includes a search input to filter meetings case-insensitively by title and description, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.

quotes: Create a history section for all meetings with search option

acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Meeting History”.
The page renders a search input with placeholder text in English.
Typing in the search input filters the rendered meeting list by meeting.title OR meeting.description (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no meetings at all, and no results for the current search query.

requirements.text: Provide a “Recent Meetings” section/page for authenticated users that shows the most recent meetings and includes a search input that filters within the recent subset by title and description case-insensitively, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.

quotes: and a recent section for recent meetings

acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Recent Meetings”.
The page displays a bounded recent subset (e.g., latest 10) derived deterministically from the meetings dataset.
Typing in the search input filters only the recent subset by meeting.title OR meeting.description (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no meetings at all, and no results for the current search query within the recent subset.

requirements.text: Provide a “Member Search” section/page for authenticated users that lists members and includes a search input to filter members case-insensitively by username, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Member Search” (or “Search Members”).
The page renders a search input with placeholder text in English.
Typing in the search input filters the rendered member list by username (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no members at all, and no results for the current search query.

requirements.text: Ensure the signed-in navigation exposes entry points to Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search so users can reliably reach these sections.

quotes: Create a history section... a recent section... and search section for members.

acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, the header navigation includes access to Meeting History and Recent Meetings under a Meetings navigation area.
When signed in, the header navigation includes access to Member Search under a Members navigation area.
Unauthenticated users cannot access these pages and are prompted to sign in instead.

constraints: Frontend code must not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Frontend code must not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if state schema changes are required.
nonGoals: Fixing the Internet Identity sign-in error shown in the screenshot ("Authentication Failed — User is already authenticated").
Adding real-time updates (WebSockets) or push notifications.
Adding external databases or third-party authentication providers.
